knimeNode.name: Spark Predictor (Classification)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Predicts input data based on a previously learned Spark ML model (e.g. Decision Tree). Please note that all feature columns selected during model training must be present in the ingoing DataFrame.

fullDescription.intro: This node labels new data points using a learned Spark ML model e.g. a Decision Tree.
fullDescription.option: When set, you can change the name of the prediction column. The default name is "Prediction (classcolumn)".
The desired name for the predicted column.
Select to append the class probability of each class to the output. For each class, a new column with name "P (classcolumn=class)".
If class probabilities are appended, the suffix allows you to avoid duplicate column names. Can be empty.

ports.inPort: Spark ML model to use for prediction.
Spark DataFrame containing the input data to predict.
ports.outPort: Input DataFrame with appended prediction column and, if selected, columns for the class probabilities.
